column1: Table 7. Total change in number of sentenced prisoners, December 31, 2000 to 2007
Authors: Heather C. West and William J. Sabol, Ph.D.
Table 7. Total change in number of sentenced prisoners, December 31, 2000 to 2007
Note: Numbers are estimated and rounded to the nearest 100. Estimates updated and may differ from previously published estimates.
a/Includes American Indians, Alaska Natives, Asians, Native Hawaiians, and other Pacific Islanders, and persons identifying two or more races.
b/Excludes persons of Hispanic or Latino origin.
